channel.title: 2006scape.com hacked
channel.description: 2006 scape has been hacked again! :( here's a video. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0zQnQ0q2zyU

item.title: 2006scape.com hacked
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:3, topic:447066”]We’ve gotten a laugh.

But I think it is fake.
Seems like a way for him to say that their site/game got deleted(or corrupted) and they cannot continue the project and they will apologize blah blah and keep the money.

Their whole team were assholes. They were to immature to even attempt this project. If this is real, they got what they deserve. If it is fake. I hope they just leave and get out of here already. Tired of their shit.[/quote]Umm… bug abuse is a real site and this is the type of stuff they do. Also, the project created a new domain to use temporarily while the others were hacked (depending on how long it was), but the majority of their traffic is definitely gone.

Read full topic
